name: STARWARS LIGHTSABER GAME
description:
its not very good but i hope you like it

there is a bug were if you die from falling or just die you cant do anything so just go to your toolbar then hover over the game and press x

there is graphic settings if your  computer cant run it that good

i dont think you need unreal engine 4 but im not sure

how to play it : right click on the zip file and press extract and then go in the game it should be called saber game

DIFFERENT SABER COLOURS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

THE FORCE!!!!!!!!!!!
